chartLabel.description: Chart label, displayed in the center of the chart
chartLabel.description_zh: 图表标签，显示在图表的中心

children.description: Additional elements rendered inside PieChart component
children.description_zh: 在 PieChart 组件中渲染的其他元素

endAngle.description: Controls angle at which charts ends, 360 by default. Set to 0 to render the chart as semicircle.
endAngle.description_zh: 控制图表结束的角度，默认为 360。设置为 0 可将图表呈现为半圆。

labelColor.description: Controls text color of all labels, by default depends on color scheme
labelColor.description_zh: 控制所有标签的文本颜色，默认情况下取决于配色方案

paddingAngle.description: Controls padding between segments, 0 by default
paddingAngle.description_zh: 控制段之间的填充，默认为 0

pieChartProps.description: Props passed down to recharts PieChart component
pieChartProps.description_zh: 传递给 recharts PieChart 组件的 props

pieProps.description: Props passed down to recharts Pie component
pieProps.description_zh: 传递给 recharts Pie 组件的 props

size.description: Controls chart width and height, height is increased by 40 if withLabels prop is set. Cannot be less than thickness. 80 by default
size.description_zh: 控制图表的宽度和高度，如果设置了 withLabels 属性，则高度增加 40。不能小于 thickness。默认为 80

startAngle.description: Controls angle at which chart starts, 0 by default. Set to 180 to render the chart as semicircle.
startAngle.description_zh: 控制图表开始的角度，默认为 0。设置为 180 可将图表呈现为半圆。

strokeColor.description: Controls color of the segments stroke, by default depends on color scheme
strokeColor.description_zh: 控制段落描边的颜色，默认情况下取决于颜色方案

strokeWidth.description: Controls width of segments stroke, 1 by default
strokeWidth.description_zh: 控制线段描边的宽度，默认为 1

thickness.description: Controls thickness of the chart segments, 20 by default
thickness.description_zh: 控制图表段的粗细，默认为 20

tooltipAnimationDuration.description: Tooltip animation duration in ms, 0 by default
tooltipAnimationDuration.description_zh: 工具提示动画持续时间（以毫秒为单位），默认为 0

tooltipDataSource.description: Determines which data is displayed in the tooltip. 'all' – display all values, 'segment' – display only hovered segment. 'all' by default.
tooltipDataSource.description_zh: 确定在工具提示中显示哪些数据。'all' – 显示所有值，'segment' – 仅显示悬停的区段。'all' 来指定。

tooltipProps.description: Props passed down to Tooltip recharts component
tooltipProps.description_zh: 传递给 Tooltip recharts 组件的 props

valueFormatter.description: A function to format values inside the tooltip
valueFormatter.description_zh: 用于格式化工具提示内值的函数

withLabels.description: Determines whether each segment should have associated label, false by default
withLabels.description_zh: 确定每个区段是否应具有关联的标签，默认情况下为 false

withLabelsLine.description: Determines whether segments labels should have lines that connect the segment with the label, true by default
withLabelsLine.description_zh: 确定区段标签是否应包含将区段与标签连接的线，默认情况下为 true

withTooltip.description: Determines whether the tooltip should be displayed when one of the section is hovered, true by default
withTooltip.description_zh: 确定当其中一个部分悬停时是否应显示工具提示，默认情况下为 true
